name: Bunny Skater
description: Try this exciting fun take on the regular running games – skating game where you can enjoy the running game challenges with a better take. For the love of skating, here is an exciting skating game challenge – The Rabbit Skater. It brings together the fun of real-time skating onto your fingertips through your smartphone. It is an amazingly easy to play 2D skating game with really smooth controls where you can skate through challenging obstacles. The character of the game – The Rabbit can perform a lot of tricks on skateboard to score points. While skating, you can collect carrots and trophies to build you collection.
